issue.title: Generate :is() selectors for nesting to match CSS

labels.name: awaiting browser support
labels.description: Blocked on at least one browser implementing something

body: The proposal has landed. Since it does involve a deprecation, I'm going to give it a month for public comment.

issue.title: Document the mixed declaration breaking change
automatic reordering of child selectors causes issues with cascading

labels.name: planned
labels.description: We would like to add this feature at some point

issue.title: Update interleaved-declarations and mark the deprecation as obsolete
issue.body:
This updates the proposal to make comments and at-rules match the
ordering of declarations. This is expected to be a safe change since
comments don't affect CSS semantics and there are currently no
plain-CSS childless at-rules that can appear in nested contexts.

Closes #3846

issue.title: Update specs for the new mixed declaration/comment/at-rule behavior
